item.title: 英国12月预算赤字收窄幅度超预期
item.description: 英国政府12月借款额降幅超预期，这有助于财政大臣瑞秋·里夫斯实现控制公共财政的目标。【原文：UK government borrowing fell more than expected in December, helping Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves in her bid to bring the public finances under control.】

item.title: 英国和欧洲股市有望因特朗普对格陵兰岛态度转变而反弹
英国向南非提供10亿美元气候协议担保
item.description: 英国与非洲开发银行向南非提供了一项与气候相关的10亿美元债务担保，挽救了一项面临失效风险的4亿美元市政融资协议。【原文：The UK and the African Development Bank extended a climate-linked $1 billion debt guarantee to South Africa, saving a $400 million municipal funding deal that was in jeopardy if it had expired.】

item.title: 印度航空在致命空难后面临创纪录的16亿美元亏损
item.description: 知情人士透露，印度航空公司去年遭遇致命空难及空域关闭，导致扭亏为盈的进展化为乌有，预计将公布创纪录的年度亏损。【原文：Air India Ltd. is set to report a record annual loss after last year’s deadly crash and airspace shutdowns wiped out progress toward a turnaround, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 香港崇光百货运营商寻求10亿美元贷款再融资
item.description: 知情人士透露，香港商场运营商生活国际控股有限公司正与银行商谈80亿港元（10.3亿美元）贷款的再融资事宜。此前数月，由于盈利持续承压，贷款方已放宽了借款条款。【原文：Hong Kong mall operator Lifestyle International Holdings Ltd. is in talks with banks to refinance a HK$8 billion ($1.03 billion) loan, months after lenders relaxed terms on the borrowing as earnings remain under pressure, said people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 俄罗斯黑海港口火灾损毁油罐致两人死亡
item.description: 俄罗斯称，周三深夜乌克兰无人机袭击了黑海某港口，导致四个燃料终端起火，造成两人死亡。【原文：Russia said Ukrainian drones hit a Black Sea port late Wednesday, setting four fuel terminals on fire and killing two people.】

item.title: 对冲基金在与三星证券的纠纷中寻求1.37亿美元赔偿
item.description: 总部位于香港的对冲基金Gen2 Partners有限公司正向三星旗下三家金融公司索赔逾1.37亿美元。【原文：Gen2 Partners Ltd., a Hong Kong-based hedge fund, is seeking more than $137 million in damages from three Samsung financial companies.】

item.title: 中国对俄罗斯液化天然气进口量意外激增，预示需求将进一步增长
item.description: 中国去年底报告的俄罗斯液化天然气采购量增幅超出预期，表明亚洲最大进口国的需求表现优于交易商此前预估。【原文：China reported a larger-than-expected surge in Russian liquefied natural gas purchases at the end of last year, suggesting better demand from Asia’s top importer than traders had priced in.】

item.title: 调查显示，诺特最有可能成为欧洲央行行长拉加德的继任者
item.description: 尽管其他候选人资质更优，但彭博社对经济学家的调查显示，荷兰人克拉斯·克诺特最有可能接替克里斯蒂娜·拉加德执掌欧洲央行。【原文：Dutchman Klaas Knot is most likely to succeed Christine Lagarde at the helm of the European Central Bank, despite other candidates being better qualified, a Bloomberg survey of economists suggests.】

item.title: 伦敦即将检验其IPO市场改革能否奏效
item.description: 历经五年筹备，伦敦金融城即将迎来检验其股权市场改革成效的关键时刻。【原文：Five years in the making, the City of London is set to find out if its equity market reforms can deliver results.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行计划允许更多投资银行家使用WhatsApp
item.description: 据知情人士透露，桑坦德银行正计划扩大允许使用WhatsApp的员工范围，此前部分员工抱怨现行部分禁令影响了业务开展。【原文：Banco Santander SA is planning to widen the group of staff allowed to use WhatsApp after some complained the existing partial ban is hurting business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 泰国亿万富翁萨拉特深化与谷歌合作，加大人工智能投资力度
item.description: 泰国最大电力生产商、亿万富翁萨拉特·拉塔纳瓦迪旗下的海湾发展公司正深化其人工智能领域的扩张，该公司已与谷歌母公司Alphabet达成协议，双方将共同探索商业机遇。【原文：Billionaire Sarath Ratanavadi’s Gulf Development Pcl, Thailand’s largest power producer, is deepening its expansion into artificial intelligence with an agreement with Alphabet Inc.’s Google to jointly explore business opportunities.】

item.title: 卫浴巨头东陶股价意外受益于人工智能热潮
item.description: 日本卫浴制造商东陶株式会社股价创下五年最大涨幅，因内存需求激增提振了市场对其鲜为人知的芯片制造材料业务增长的预期。【原文：Shares of Japanese toilet maker Toto Ltd. gained the most in five years after booming memory demand excited expectations of growth in its little-known chipmaking materials operations.】

item.title: 首尔房价上涨势头加速，加深韩国央行政策困境
item.description: 韩国首都的房价上涨行情持续近一年，使韩国银行的政策考量更为复杂——此前该国经济在2025年第四季度已陷入萎缩。【原文：A housing rally in South Korea’s capital extended to almost a full year, further complicating the Bank of Korea’s policy calculus after the economy slid into contraction during the final quarter of 2025.】

item.title: 马来西亚考虑修改社交媒体规则，此前Grok AI引发轩然大波
item.description: 马来西亚正重新审视其社交媒体平台监管规则，此前埃隆·马斯克旗下Grok人工智能聊天机器人生成的性化人物图像引发强烈抗议。【原文：Malaysia is reviewing its rules for regulating social media platforms after an outcry over sexualized images of people generated by Elon Musk’s Grok artificial intelligence chatbot.】

item.title: 沃尔玛、Tiger Global参与PhonePe 15亿美元IPO认购
item.description: 沃尔玛公司和Tiger Global Management等机构投资者参与了数字支付公司PhonePe Ltd.的股票认购，此次发行有望成为印度自去年10月以来规模最大的首次公开募股。【原文：Walmart Inc. and Tiger Global Management are among the backers of digital payments company PhonePe Ltd. offering shares in what’s set to be India’s biggest initial public offering since October.】

item.title: 日本超长期债券在暴跌后连续第二日上涨
item.description: 日本国债连续第二个交易日反弹，超长期国债领涨。此前因首相高市早苗的减税竞选承诺引发本周初市场抛售潮，如今市场情绪趋稳。【原文：Japanese government bonds rebounded for a second straight session, led by super-long maturities as market sentiment steadied after a steep selloff earlier this week triggered by Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s election pledge to cut taxes.】

item.title: 更多日本企业意识到利率上升的负面影响
item.description: 日本越来越多的企业认为利率上升对其业务产生负面影响，这凸显了日本央行在经历多年超低借贷成本后推行政策正常化所面临的挑战。【原文：An increasing percentage of companies in Japan see rising interest rates having a negative impact on their business, underscoring the challenges for the Bank of Japan as it normalizes policy after years of ultra-low borrowing costs.】

item.title: 俄罗斯旗舰油轮在中国沉没，因印度买家撤单
item.description: 俄罗斯旗舰产品乌拉尔原油运往中国的价格已跌至前所未有的低点，因印度加工企业对该品种的需求放缓，导致该批货物的竞争减弱。【原文：Prices of Russia’s flagship Urals crude for delivery to China have dropped to an unprecedented low as demand for the grade from Indian processors eases off, lessening competition for the cargoes.】

item.title: 铜价上涨，因特朗普在格陵兰岛争端中立场软化
item.description: 铜价上涨，因美国总统特朗普降低对欧洲伙伴国有关格陵兰岛的威胁后，风险偏好有所改善。【原文：Copper rose as risk appetite improved on US President Donald Trump’s dialing down on threats against European partners over Greenland.】

item.title: 花旗称韩国或将推出68亿美元新刺激计划
item.description: 花旗集团周四在一份报告中表示，韩国可能最早于3月推出约10万亿韩元（68亿美元）的新一轮财政刺激计划，以应对经济增长不均衡的问题，预计文化和艺术等领域将获得支持。【原文：South Korea is likely to roll out around 10 trillion won ($6.8 billion) in fresh fiscal stimulus as early as March to address uneven economic growth, with support expected for sectors including culture and the arts, Citigroup said in a report Thursday.】

item.title: 印度央行将关注卢比贬值速度，策略师称
item.description: 策略师表示，随着卢比汇率跌至历史新低，印度储备银行可能会试图控制卢比汇率的波动节奏，而非捍卫特定汇率水平。【原文：The Reserve Bank of India will likely try to manage the pace of moves in the rupee rather than defend specific levels as the currency plumbs record lows, according to strategists.】

item.title: 正如格陵兰人所言："特朗普·塔马蒂古特·库努蒂塔尔波克"
item.description:
随着市场逐渐摆脱入侵关税风波的影响，TACO交易卷土重来。

【原文：

The TACO trade is back as markets shake off the invasion-tariff drama.

】

item.title: 东京电力公司重启核反应堆次日暂停重启计划
item.description: 日本最大电力公司东京电力公司暂停了其位于新潟县核电站的重启程序，此前该公司刚在2011年福岛核事故后重启了首座反应堆，距此仅过去不到一天时间。【原文：Tokyo Electric Power Co., Japan’s largest utility, suspended the restart process of its nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture, less than a day after resuming its first reactor since the 2011 Fukushima disaster.】

item.title: 明报报道：香港两名高官将辞职
item.description: 据《明报》报道，香港负责房屋及政制事务的司长将很快离任，此举是高层人事调整的一部分。【原文：Hong Kong ministers overseeing housing and constitutional affairs will step down soon as part of a high-level reshuffle, Ming Pao reported.】

item.title: Zomato母公司Eternal股价飙升，快闪电商业务提振盈利
item.description: 周四早盘交易中，永恒有限公司股价在孟买股市大幅上涨。该公司快速商业业务的强劲势头推动其季度盈利增长，并促使多家券商上调其评级。【原文：Eternal Ltd.’s shares jumped in early trading in Mumbai on Thursday after strong momentum in its quick-commerce business boosted its quarterly earnings and prompted several broker upgrades.】

item.title: 油价飙升之际，新油轮加入俄罗斯石油贸易实属罕见之举
item.description: 飙升的运费已诱使部分船东启用新油轮运输俄罗斯原油，而这项业务通常由接近——甚至偶尔超过——常规使用寿命的老旧船舶承担。【原文：Soaring freight rates have enticed some shipowners to use new tankers to transport Russian oil, a trade usually carried out by older vessels that are close to — and occasionally over — their usual lifespan.】

item.title: 气泡饮料制造商奇趣森林据传考虑在香港上市
item.description: 知情人士透露，低卡路里气泡饮料和风味茶制造商奇森林正考虑在香港首次公开募股，此举效仿了其他中国饮料公司的做法。【原文：Chi Forest, a maker of low-calorie sparkling drinks and flavored teas, is considering a Hong Kong initial public offering, people familiar with the matter said, following in the footsteps of other Chinese beverage companies.】

item.title: 高盛将年底黄金价格预测上调至每盎司5400美元
item.description: 高盛集团将年底黄金价格预测上调至每盎司5400美元，理由是私人投资者和中央银行的需求日益增长。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. raised its year-end gold forecast to $5,400 an ounce, citing intensifying demand from private investors and central banks.】

item.title: 交易员寻求摆脱"抛售印度"主题
item.description: 在股市阴霾笼罩下，黄金、白银ETF成为亮点。【原文：Gold, silver ETFs are bright spots amid the stock gloom.】
